sample_docs: Business Enterprise The essential impact of Smart City is to create visibility, effectivity, and efficiency across the variety of functions in public services Ads Analytics PDF Focusing on the viewers' impression toward a particular ad campaign, the Artificial Intelligence (AI) can present the detailed information of the audience's profile so that it can strengthen the business decision. Advertisers or marketers are often raising concern about the traditional ads exposure metrics, that usually are a projection number – using sampling methods. Those numbers are not reliable enough to be an insightful information of an ads placement or campaign effectiveness. Analytics: Face Recognition Supported in: Cloud API Analytics , On Premise Analytics Store Analytics PDF Artificial Intelligence (AI) is undoubtedly reshaping the potentials of data analytics, including the store analytics which given the brands and/or products the opportunity to gain insights to unlock their customer base. The AI technology enables research and analyzes the numerous customer profiles, discover the exact customer preferences and interests in creating an effective campaign strategy at the store Know Your Customer (KYC) Know Your Customer (KYC) is the process of business on verifying the identity of the customer and client, as well as valuing their suitability along with potential risk toward potential business relationship. Using the Artificial Intelligence (AI) Technology, it can shorten the process to be more efficient by requiring the customers or clients physical identity (facial biometrics) for verification and authentication system. Nodeflux Analytics Monitor and take action with your video analytics data in real-time to improve your business operations Customizable widgets for at-a-glance system status Interactive data visualizations for deep insights Real-time data streaming for continuous analysis Face Analytics Nodeflux VisionAIre Analytics presents a groundbreaking Face Analytics solution, unlocking the power of advanced facial recognition technology. This cutting-edge system offers unparalleled accuracy and speed, revolutionizing security, customer service, and personalized experiences across various industries. Face Recognition Most Popular Face Recognition by Nodeflux is an AI-powered computer vision solution that accurately identifies and verifies individuals by analyzing facial features from video streams or images. It is designed for real-time applications, leveraging deep learning algorithms to detect and recognize faces in a wide range of environments. This solution can be used for access control, security monitoring, and identity verification. Dynamic Watchlist Management High Processing and Accuracy Proven in Many International Events People Oriented Analytics Transform your understanding of human behavior and movement patterns with Nodeflux VisionAIre Analytics' comprehensive People Oriented Analytics suite. This powerful collection of tools provides invaluable insights for crowd management, safety compliance, and operational optimization. People Analytics New SKU Object Detection Multiple Logic People Analytics by Nodeflux is an AI-driven solution designed to provide accurate detection, tracking, and analysis of people in video streams. It helps organizations monitor crowd behavior, track foot traffic, and gather insights for decision-making in real-time. This solution is useful in various environments, including smart cities, retail, and public spaces, enhancing both operational efficiency and security. Enabler for Enrichment Attribute Data Insight Rich People Analytics Applications Multiple Counter Line and Detection Area People Anomaly Analytics Stay one step ahead of potential security threats and disruptive behaviors with Nodeflux VisionAIre Analytics' advanced People Anomaly Analytics. This suite employs sophisticated AI algorithms to detect and alert on unusual or concerning activities. Person Shooting Detection New SKU Object Detection Person Using Firearms Detection by Nodeflux enhances security in high-risk areas by detecting individuals holding or using firearms. This solution enables rapid response by security personnel and is particularly useful for critical infrastructures such as airports, government buildings, or public spaces. Immediate Detection of Firearms Customizable Alert System for Threat Response Real-Time Integration with Security Systems People Behavior Analytics Elevate your understanding of human actions and interactions with Nodeflux VisionAIre Analytics' innovative People Behavior Analytics. This suite offers unprecedented insights into specific behaviors, enabling proactive management and improved policy enforcement. Person Smoking Detection New SKU Object Detection Person Smoking Detection by Nodeflux detects individuals smoking in restricted or no-smoking areas. This solution helps organizations enforce smoking policies and ensure compliance in environments such as offices, public buildings, or transportation hubs. Real-time detection of prohibited smoking activities Customizable Alerts for Prohibited Areas Supports Integration with Existing Monitoring Systems Vehicle Analytics Revolutionize traffic management, parking operations, and vehicle-related security with Nodeflux VisionAIre Analytics' comprehensive Vehicle Analytics suite. Leverage AI-powered insights to optimize traffic flow, enhance security, and improve overall transportation infrastructure. Vehicle Analytics New SKU Object Detection Multiple Logic Nodeflux Vehicle Analytics offers a comprehensive analysis of vehicle movements, classifications, and behaviors captured through video feeds. It can detect and categorize vehicles based on type (e.g., cars, trucks, motorcycles, bus) and provide data that supports traffic management, parking systems, or law enforcement operations. Multiclass Vehicle Classification Rich Vehicle Analytics Applications to Support Multiple Scenario Multiple Counter Line and Detection Area Environment Analytics Harness the power of AI to monitor and protect our environment with Nodeflux VisionAIre Analytics' innovative Environment Analytics suite. This collection of tools provides critical insights for disaster prevention, resource management, and safety enhancement. Pre-Flood Monitoring New SKU VisionLLM Nodeflux Pre-Flood Monitoring analyzes environmental factors and provides early warnings of potential flooding. By monitoring water levels and weather conditions, it helps authorities and property managers mitigate risks and prepare for possible floods, improving disaster response and public safety. Our spirit to be part of the Indonesia's technology development, makes us realize that Indonesia needs a lot of hands. It is an honor for us to be able to initiate the spirit of mutual cooperation. Together with Nodeflux, we will accelerate in delivering artificial intelligence based solutions to our clients. Nodeflux Catalyst is a partnership platform initiated by us that enables you to expand your business and grow your AI ecosystem. With our core expertise in Computer Vision AI, Nodeflux Catalyst offers various business models and topology you may utilize to excel your existing business process. What We Will Gain Sales & Technical Enablement Sales & Technical Support - Compatibility certification to scale up product technology - Improve or add new features - Competitive advantage exploration - Roadmap technology development - Expand the adoption of product to wider & diversified market - Tailored product to become end-to-end solution - Use case development - Penetrate mature product and widen market reach - Encourage customers to upsell and buy more products - Settle the channel and value chain to be low touch selling Jl. Kemang Timur No.24, RT.7/RW.4, Bangka, Mampang Prpt., Jakarta Selatan, 12730 (021) 22718184 ††Style Guide / Image Licensing

Does Nodeflux directly supported by NVIDIA? Yes, Nodeflux was part of NVIDIA Inception Program, and now is listed as one of NVIDIA Metropolis Software Partners . What architecture does Nodeflux support? Nodeflux supports on grid architecture, on cloud architecture. more information, see here. What type of object can I see? Face , person, vehicle, anything. What is Nodeflux analytic recognize by nist? Nodeflux face recognition is validated in NIST FRVT on September 2019 and scored 99.83% accuracy in LFW (Labeled Faces in the Wild) dataset (see here) . Is there any restriction for camera based on brand? We have agnostic principle for camera. But, we have restriction for resolution, encoding, bitrate and fps. What kind of analytics can I use? How do I adopt or implement your products? Our VisionAIre platform has three components: the analytics, the system architecture , and how would you like to deploy the system itself. Based on that, we could consult you the best way to approach your problem with visionAI. Contact us for further information. How can I improve the accuracy? Is the machine automatically learn? The analytics can always be improved. Is nodeflux providing the camera? We only provide the software. Do you store images on your server? What happens to them? We value your privacy, we do not save your image in our server. In addition, we do not save contextual information about your requests. Jl Kemang Timur No. 24, Mampang Prapatan, Jakarta Selatan, 12730 (021) 22718184 - business@nodeflux.io
